segment.src_text: 欢迎来到我们的联合国气候变化框架公约秘书处的访谈节目。
segment.trg_text: Welcome to the interview program of the Secretariat of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.

utterance.sub_src_text: 欢迎来到我们的联合国气候变化框架公约秘书处的访谈节目。
utterance.sub_trg_text: Welcome to the interview program of the Secretariat of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.

segment.src_text: 呃，那么呢，我想首先邀请你介绍一下，你这次是以什么样的一个身份来参加COP二十八的？
segment.trg_text: would like to first invite you to introduce in what in what capacity you are participating in COP28 this time?

utterance.sub_src_text: 呃，那么呢，我想首先邀请你介绍一下，
utterance.sub_trg_text: would like to first invite you to introduce in what

utterance.sub_src_text: 你这次是以什么样的一个身份来参加COP二十八的？
utterance.sub_trg_text: in what capacity you are participating in COP28 this time?

segment.src_text: 感谢你，然后呢，我这次呢是代表我们世界大学气候变化联盟，啊这个平台，
segment.trg_text: Thank you. This time, I represented the platform of University Alliance for Climate Change,

utterance.sub_src_text: 感谢你，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Thank you.

utterance.sub_src_text: 然后呢，我这次呢是代表我们世界大学气候变化联盟，啊这个平台，
utterance.sub_trg_text: This time, I represented the platform of University Alliance for Climate Change,

term.src: 世界大学气候变化联盟
term.trg: Global Alliance of Universities on Climate (GAUC)

segment.src_text: 带领了我们来自三十个啊来自世界各地的学生，
segment.trg_text: and led 30 students from all over the world,

utterance.sub_src_text: 带领了我们来自三十个啊来自世界各地的学生，
utterance.sub_trg_text: and led 30 students from all over the world,

segment.src_text: 啊，作为团长的职责带着，带着大家来到第二十八次的这个缔约方会上。
segment.trg_text: and, in my capacity as the head of the delegation, brought everyone to the 28th Conference of the Parties.

utterance.sub_src_text: 啊，作为团长的职责带着，带着大家来到第二十八次的这个缔约方会上。
utterance.sub_trg_text: and, in my capacity as the head of the delegation, brought everyone to the 28th Conference of the Parties.

segment.src_text: 那我们也是，啊，非常荣幸地有不同的边会啊预约，
segment.trg_text: We are also extremely honored to participate in various side events and have appointments.

utterance.sub_src_text: 那我们也是，啊，非常荣幸地有不同的边会啊预约，
utterance.sub_trg_text: We are also extremely honored to participate in various side events and have appointments.

segment.src_text: 啊我也是带着学生们让学生有更多的机会把他们的学习学员、成果带到国际的舞台，
segment.trg_text: I'm going to lead these students and provide them with more opportunities to showcase their learning and achievements on the international stage,

utterance.sub_src_text: 啊我也是带着学生们让学生有更多的机会把他们的学习学员、成果带到国际的舞台，
utterance.sub_trg_text: I'm going to lead these students and provide them with more opportunities to showcase their learning and achievements on the international stage,

segment.src_text: 让更多的人能够看见他们的成果。那同时呢，
segment.trg_text: so that their accomplishments can be exposed to more people. Meanwhile,

utterance.sub_src_text: 让更多的人能够看见他们的成果。
utterance.sub_trg_text: so that their accomplishments can be exposed to more people.

utterance.sub_src_text: 那同时呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Meanwhile,

segment.src_text: 他们也是非常有幸地可以到不同的缔约方会上了解到谈谈判的现场，
segment.trg_text: it's fortunate for them to attend different Conference of the Parties to gain an insight into the negotiation scene,

utterance.sub_src_text: 他们也是非常有幸地可以到不同的缔约方会上了解到谈谈判的现场，
utterance.sub_trg_text: it's fortunate for them to attend different Conference of the Parties to gain an insight into the negotiation scene,

segment.src_text: 了解到在国际舞台上大家是如何去交谈，如何去啊把气候这个议题展开，去把大家的成果分享、学习到的。
segment.trg_text: understand how people communicate on the international stage, how to expand the climate change issue, share and learn from other people's achievements.

utterance.sub_src_text: 了解到在国际舞台上大家是如何去交谈，
utterance.sub_trg_text: understand how people communicate on the international stage,

utterance.sub_src_text: 如何去啊把气候这个议题展开，
utterance.sub_trg_text: how to expand the climate change issue,

utterance.sub_src_text: 去把大家的成果分享、学习到的。
utterance.sub_trg_text: share and learn from other people's achievements.

segment.src_text: 嗯，非常好，非常重要的这个一个角色。
segment.trg_text: Very good. It's a very important role.

utterance.sub_trg_text: Very good.

utterance.sub_src_text: 非常重要的这个一个角色。
utterance.sub_trg_text: It's a very important role.

segment.src_text: 那么我们都知道你是世界大学气候变化联盟的首席青年官，
segment.trg_text: Since we all know that you are the Chief Youth Officer of the University Alliance for Climate Change,

utterance.sub_src_text: 那么我们都知道你是世界大学气候变化联盟的首席青年官，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Since we all know that you are the Chief Youth Officer of the University Alliance for Climate Change,

term.src: 世界大学气候变化联盟
term.trg: Global Alliance of Universities on Climate (GAUC)

segment.src_text: 可否请你再给我们多介绍一下这个联盟，它的历史，还有一个定位和角色？
segment.trg_text: could you please provide more details about this alliance, such as its history, as well as its positioning and role?

utterance.sub_src_text: 可否请你再给我们多介绍一下这个联盟，
utterance.sub_trg_text: could you please provide more details about this alliance,

utterance.sub_src_text: 它的历史，
utterance.sub_trg_text: such as its history,

utterance.sub_src_text: 还有一个定位和角色？
utterance.sub_trg_text: as well as its positioning and role?

segment.src_text: 是的，我们这个联盟呢，其实是在四年前在呃世界经济论坛坛上，首次由我们大概八个大学的校长在一个会议上共同敲定下来的。
segment.trg_text: Yes, our alliance was established four years ago at a meeting on the World Economic Forum by the presidents of about eight universities for the first time.

utterance.sub_src_text: 是的，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Yes,

utterance.sub_src_text: 我们这个联盟呢，其实是在四年前在呃世界经济论坛坛上，
utterance.sub_trg_text: our alliance was established four years ago at a meeting on the World Economic Forum

utterance.sub_src_text: 首次由我们大概八个大学的校长在一个会议上共同敲定下来的。
utterance.sub_trg_text: by the presidents of about eight universities for the first time.

segment.src_text: 我我们最初的初衷呢，就是认为气候变化这个议题其实非常的广大，而且需要多方的合作，
segment.trg_text: Our original aspiration was that the issue of climate change is actually very extensive and requires multi-party collaboration

utterance.sub_src_text: 我我们最初的初衷呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Our original aspiration was that

utterance.sub_src_text: 就是认为气候变化这个议题其实非常的广大，
utterance.sub_trg_text: the issue of climate change is actually very extensive

utterance.sub_src_text: 而且需要多方的合作，
utterance.sub_trg_text: and requires multi-party collaboration

segment.src_text: 需要来自全球不同的地大学、地方的人共同来协作。
segment.trg_text: and the joint efforts of people from different universities and regions around the world.

utterance.sub_src_text: 需要来自全球不同的地大学、地方的人共同来协作。
utterance.sub_trg_text: and the joint efforts of people from different universities and regions around the world.

segment.src_text: 那所以说呢，在四年前的这一个会议上呢，大家就起草了这个联盟的呃初心成立。
segment.trg_text: So, at this meeting four years ago, the participants drafted to establish the alliance's original aspiration.

utterance.sub_src_text: 那所以说呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: So,

utterance.sub_src_text: 在四年前的这一个会议上呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: at this meeting four years ago,

utterance.sub_src_text: 大家就起草了这个联盟的呃初心成立。
utterance.sub_trg_text: the participants drafted to establish the alliance's original aspiration.

segment.src_text: 那后后来呢，我们过去这两三年呢，也是扩充了把这个联盟现在是有十五个成员大学，都是来自六个大洲九个国家的。
segment.trg_text: Later, in the past two or three years, we have expanded the alliance. Now there are 15 member universities from nine countries on six continents,

utterance.sub_src_text: 那后后来呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Later,

utterance.sub_src_text: 我们过去这两三年呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: in the past two or three years,

utterance.sub_src_text: 也是扩充了把这个联盟现在是有十五个成员大学，
utterance.sub_trg_text: we have expanded the alliance. Now there are 15 member universities

utterance.sub_src_text: 都是来自六个大洲九个国家的。
utterance.sub_trg_text: from nine countries on six continents,

segment.src_text: 那包括像中国，我们这边也是呃联席主席，呃，清华大学和我们在英国的联席主席是啊伦敦啊政经学院LSE，
segment.trg_text: including China which is also the co-chair, Tsinghua University and the co-chair in the UK is the London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE).

utterance.sub_src_text: 那包括像中国，我们这边也是呃联席主席，呃，清华大学
utterance.sub_trg_text: including China which is also the co-chair, Tsinghua University

utterance.sub_src_text: 和我们在英国的联席主席是啊伦敦啊政经学院LSE，
utterance.sub_trg_text: and the co-chair in the UK is the London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE).

segment.src_text: 那我们这个联盟还有比如美国的哥伦比亚大学呀，啊，耶鲁大学啊，
segment.trg_text: The alliance is also supported by universities such as Columbia University, Yale University in the United States,

utterance.sub_src_text: 那我们这个联盟还有比如美国的哥伦比亚大学呀，啊，耶鲁大学啊，
utterance.sub_trg_text: The alliance is also supported by universities such as Columbia University, Yale University in the United States,

segment.src_text: 还有比如来自南美洲、非洲、澳洲，啊，甚至东京等等的这些国家我们都有啊其中啊成员校的支持。
segment.trg_text: and universities from South America, Africa, Australia and even Tokyo and other countries.

utterance.sub_src_text: 还有比如来自南美洲、非洲、澳洲，啊，甚至东京等等的这些国家我们都有啊其中啊成员校的支持。
utterance.sub_trg_text: and universities from South America, Africa, Australia and even Tokyo and other countries.

segment.src_text: 那这个联盟呢，就是我们所有的这些大学会共同努力去做联合研究，
segment.trg_text: In this alliance all these universities will work together to conduct joint research,

utterance.sub_src_text: 那这个联盟呢，就是我们所有的这些大学会共同努力去做联合研究，
utterance.sub_trg_text: In this alliance all these universities will work together to conduct joint research,

segment.src_text: 呃，公众呃了解、呃推广青年行动等等的这些工作呢，去让我们呃更加的团结，
segment.trg_text: public popularization and promotion of youth actions, etc., so that we can become more united

utterance.sub_src_text: 呃，公众呃了解、呃推广青年行动等等的这些工作呢，
utterance.sub_trg_text: public popularization and promotion of youth actions, etc.,

utterance.sub_src_text: 去让我们呃更加的团结，
utterance.sub_trg_text: so that we can become more united

segment.src_text: 并且呢让更多的交流呃，跨元素、跨国界、跨学科、跨文化的种种交流能够呢呃比较顺畅。
segment.trg_text: and have more exchanges across elements, borders, disciplines, and cultures, and ensure that they are conducted smoothly.

utterance.sub_src_text: 并且呢让更多的交流呃，跨元素、跨国界、跨学科、跨文化的种种交流能够呢呃比较顺畅。
utterance.sub_trg_text: and have more exchanges across elements, borders, disciplines, and cultures, and ensure that they are conducted smoothly.

segment.src_text: 好的，那么联盟今年已经进入了第五个年头，呃，以前也都是参加过，呃，往年的COP，
segment.trg_text: OK. This year marks the fifth year of the establishment of this alliance. It has also been engaged in previous COPs before.

utterance.sub_trg_text: OK.

segment.trg_text: This year, how many young people are there in the alliance participating in COP28? What are the activities held at this conference?

segment.src_text: 我们呃联盟呢，算是第三次，呃带青年团来参加啊COP。
segment.trg_text: This is the third time for our alliance to bring the youth delegation to participate in COP.

segment.trg_text: Actually before, I was also the head of the delegation of the COP27 last year.
